languages.text: "Скверномысленные богохульники". {n}Вокс Паскаля изрыгает яростное шипение статических помех.{/n} "Хладный торг — позорное покушение на привилегии {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}". {n}Техножрец мрачно сверлит суровым взглядом Владайма, чьи прозрачные глаза явно избегают смотреть в лицо Паскаля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Скверномысленные богохульники". {n}Вокс Паскаля изрыгает яростное шипение статических помех.{/n} "Хладный торг — позорное покушение на привилегии Адептус Механикус". {n}Техножрец мрачно сверлит суровым взглядом Владайма, чьи прозрачные глаза явно избегают смотреть в лицо Паскаля.{/n}

languages.text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Скверномысленные богохульники". {n}Вокс Паскаля изрыгает яростное шипение статических помех.{/n} "Хладный торг — позорное покушение на привилегии {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}". {n}Техножрец мрачно сверлит суровым взглядом Владайма, чьи прозрачные глаза явно избегают смотреть в лицо Паскаля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pascal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pascal's.{/n}

"Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pascal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pascal's.{/n}

"Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pascal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pascal's.{/n}

"Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pascal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pascal's.{/n}

"Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

languages.text: 「汚れた思想の冒涜者ども」{n}パスカルのヴォクスは、どっと激しくシューシューと音を立てる。{/n}「闇取引は、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の特権に対する恥ずべき侵害だ」{n}パスカルはヴラダイムを睨みつけるが、その透明な目は明らかにパスカルの視線を避けている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「汚れた思想の冒涜者ども」{n}パスカルのヴォクスは、どっと激しくシューシューと音を立てる。{/n}「闇取引は、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の特権に対する恥ずべき侵害だ」{n}パスカルはヴラダイムを睨みつけるが、その透明な目は明らかにパスカルの視線を避けている。{/n}

languages.text: “思想不净的亵渎者。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置爆发出愤怒的嘶嘶声。{/n}“冷市贸易是对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}特权的可耻侵犯。”{n}他怒视着弗拉迪姆，而弗拉迪姆那双透明的眼睛显然在努力避免与帕斯卡对视。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “思想不净的亵渎者。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置爆发出愤怒的嘶嘶声。{/n}“冷市贸易是对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}特权的可耻侵犯。”{n}他怒视着弗拉迪姆，而弗拉迪姆那双透明的眼睛显然在努力避免与帕斯卡对视。{/n}

languages.text: «Blasfemos de impías intenciones». {n}El voco de Pasqal estalla con interferencias furiosas y siseantes.{/n} «El Comercio Frío es una violación denigrante de los privilegios del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}». {n}Mira fijamente a Vladaym, cuyos ojos transparentes evitan claramente los de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Blasfemos de impías intenciones». {n}El voco de Pasqal estalla con interferencias furiosas y siseantes.{/n} «El Comercio Frío es una violación denigrante de los privilegios del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}». {n}Mira fijamente a Vladaym, cuyos ojos transparentes evitan claramente los de Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des grésillements furieux jaillissent du système-vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Des blasphémateurs aux pensées impures. Le Commerce Froid empiète honteusement sur les privilèges de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. » {n}Il lance un regard noir à Vladaym Tocara, dont les yeux transparents évitent soigneusement ceux de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des grésillements furieux jaillissent du système-vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Des blasphémateurs aux pensées impures. Le Commerce Froid empiète honteusement sur les privilèges de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. » {n}Il lance un regard noir à Vladaym Tocara, dont les yeux transparents évitent soigneusement ceux de Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: "Gotteslästerer mit unreinen Gedanken." {n}Aus Pasqals Vox dröhnt ein wütendes Rauschen.{/n} "Der Kalthandel ist ein schamloser Eingriff in die Privilegien des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}Er fixiert Vladaym, dessen durchsichtige Augen die von Pasqal eindeutig meiden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gotteslästerer mit unreinen Gedanken." {n}Aus Pasqals Vox dröhnt ein wütendes Rauschen.{/n} "Der Kalthandel ist ein schamloser Eingriff in die Privilegien des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}Er fixiert Vladaym, dessen durchsichtige Augen die von Pasqal eindeutig meiden.{/n}

languages.text: "Sapkın fikirli günahkârlar." {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, öfkeli ve tıslayan bir parazitle patlıyor.{/n} "Soğuk Ticaret, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'un{/g} ayrıcalıklarına yapılmış rezilce bir gasptır." {n}Pasqal, saydam gözlerini kendisinden açıkça kaçıran Vladaym'a dik dik bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blasphemers of impure thought." {n}Pasqal's vox erupts with furious, hissing static.{/n} "The Cold Trade is a shameful encroachment on the privileges of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}." {n}He glares at Vladaym, whose transparent eyes are clearly avoiding Pasqal's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Murdar fikirli günahkârlar..." {n}diye patlıyor Pasqal'ın voksu öfkeli ve tıslayan bir parazitle.{/n} "Soğuk Ticaret, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'un ayrıcalıklarına utanç verici bir tecavüzdür." {n}Saydam gözlerini Pasqal'dan açıkça kaçıran Vladaym'a dik dik bakıyor.{/n}
